重返千禧跨年夜：

•無敵河景:  台北市絕無僅有的101河岸視角，水岸第一排景觀包廂，絕美日落與城市夜景呼應，建議提早入場享受。

•異國美食:  由外國美食攤商主理，原汁原味，異國直送，跨年寒冷夜，不怕沒熱食可吃。

There is a semi -outdoor space next to the bar next to the dock. It is very comfortable here. There are invincible landscapes. It is suitable for drinking a glass of wine next to the dock. The film is 2022/23 New Year's Eve party.

Return to Millennium New Year's Eve:

• Invincible river view: Taipei City's unique 101 river bank perspective, the first row of the waterfront landscape boxes, beautiful sunset to the city night view, it is recommended to enter early to enjoy.
• 90 dance music: Well -known DJ mix and match 80 ~ Millennium music, you can dance and swing, or you can be pregnant, you can find a corner of you in M ​​Club, enjoy the comfort after unblocking.
• Yacht New Year's Eve: The Keelung River closest to 101 fireworks, gathering on the private yacht river, waiting for the countdown of the fireworks, comparable to international marine cities, becoming the latest attraction in Taipei. Because yacht tickets have been sold out, this event is only sold on land activities to enter the event. Field coupons.
